Package io.helidon.service.configuration.hikaricp.localhost

Provides classes and interfaces for automatically discovering service configuration information relevant to Hikari connection pool componentry suitable for local testing environments.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HikariCPServiceConfigurationLocalhost
    A HikariCPServiceConfiguration that can dynamically add data source properties when they are requested.
    HikariCPServiceConfigurationLocalhostProvider
    A HikariCPServiceConfigurationProvider that automatically creates in-memory H2 databases as needed.

Package io.helidon.service.configuration.hikaricp.localhost Description

Provides classes and interfaces for automatically discovering service configuration information relevant to Hikari connection pool componentry suitable for local testing environments.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
HikariCPServiceConfigurationLocalhost, HikariCPServiceConfigurationLocalhostProvider
